feed.title: Radarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.15.1.9463
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 179637fe8ba20c219849e085d395bfccd7e3f300 Fixed: Release dates for Discover Movie posters
  • 09b4bf15cf668c81f8bbd43478b8d24c81972b74 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • ea86d14ca7d2ca896f2487c22bce5d026ad63602 Fixed: Normalize unicode characters when comparing paths for equality
  • 2429dd91c6d08eb2b70b14db2b3c673d320e6a5c Allow GetFileSize to follow symlinks
  • a752476cdb9435615d563496480ecbe54dbd9bb9 Fixed: Allow files to be moved from Torrent Blackhole even when remove is disabled
  • 50ce480abf043140e209d2d2959fbea8dd5dd2ab Pin ReportGenerator in Azure Pipelines for .NET 6
  • 0ef6e56e5d0a69f2a9248b71a5100e7edf2c49df Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 12d50141259e3a73714e8345a0037da6a8a1697b New: Track Kometa metadata files [ #10059, #10419, #10311 ]
  • c8301d425c9b4b227a45b0376a13c63c581a92ba Fix translation token for Mount Health Check
  • b1df9b2401e0e2d593dc681b5292b7a3b8adca85 Automated API Docs update
See More * ff09da3a69ce312da38a43c824f1768a84fafefa New: Filter queue by status [ #10648 ] * 3b9bd696fbb1743a57a3d330eb960b82e2d44013 New: Favorite folders in Manual Import [ #10630 ] * 9ab3e6bab73fa6a21e4d9afb851438c266883e68 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 86f4f86a0ad2241df5602770e473f9efdb954591 Fixed: Filtering queue by multiple qualities [ #10647 ] * 40d95a04e3ba96a36dded87def8f272764b42653 Sync coding style with upstream for join methods [ #10637 ] * ca724836ce1355df91cf64063b45043c91788c2c Rename Manage Custom Formats to Manage Formats [ #10629 ] * 10e39641118ea98fefb66d312fc91d5c32d2426d New: Use instance name in PWA manifest [ #10625 ] * b22a86e1d7059dcafc81bc5d823d186e44bacb5b New: Include source path with Webhook import event movie file [ #10635 ] * 5976d66511ce1ac5250d7f613517324be5233a35 New: Reject files during import that have no audio tracks [ #10643 ] * b4eff4d4f9f20a9e4b3b46c9dbd31914c0a238ed Show a movie path as example in Mount Health Check [ #10649 ] * 1414a09111b7684ba8c90bd645bfe416e080c91c New: Add individual edit to Manage Custom Formats * b30efd0c62fc3f12bd3ca6bd5383b5f1cfb4dc63 Use current time for cache break in development * def6950db4f9262e5e106ebfe3e4f0384fb1efb3 Fixed: Use download client name for history column * f23c2dbaba100bf05de47db667b76e94e84ef3a9 Increase retries for DebouncerFixture * 186e9cdd2317673634152fc3d20b9957b426c60f Bump version to 5.15.1 * 394f34eb2ac5677d64e232431667a63287fb79cc Fixed: Root folder existence for import lists and movie collections * d9f508280de74c48cf534c47fc6472edd011e0a6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * b5505800de3065b3a440cf074d2d8faeb0d8f31e Fix file browser translations * 48a79eb7d3eff9b3ffe362a03462d34e79f6bb2c Fixed: Loading queue with pending releases for deleted movies * b42f7e09f9fc29af05512cda1653b934658495f7 Fixed: Cleaning the French preposition 'à' from titles * 8f507ac726179c82de561bec9615272112f21149 Fixed: Parse "Català" and "Catalán" as Catalan * 06d54e0ec212cdc8646e766fed642a5583946a2f Update JetBrains logos [ #10603 ] * 3708d58847d0ab89f3db285ee346483c9509deb1 Fixed: Custom filtering movies by year [ #10610 ] * 0049ccd39f4e869dc2a5e3348a59130db562b9a5 Inherit trigger from pushed command models [ #10592 ] * ab8a2d190e3d173ebd99117190e8281b048c9cf5 Improve message for grab errors due to no matching tags [ #10593 ] * 25bb52b206847a56fed6361118435b297498e57f Use `OperatingSystem` class to get OS information * 63c6f70e677f45846fc3ac5da7ffd66341ba24fe Fixed: Changing movies to another root folder without moving files * 79cd6269f4cf393f8eac3051222f065a2566d011 Fixed: Status check for completed directories in Deluge * 879c8721793d4d4e37a2ce42fa3384cd3cd47667 Cleanse exceptions in event logs * d4993cf69b64b8472cdad92f59ff56e8091bc3bb Bump version to 5.15.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=139&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.16.3.9541
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 99c3c8ce5b03fc75b620e54fc6e96fbee3a2053c Replace URLs in translations with tokens
  • 85171e40a58d65f3e6b2d137701ef95e649e4b6f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 86b656d323567e1fc83f61a79c41778cbeba91eb Use minor version for core-js in babel/preset-env
  • 5ae5d1043a78990ff3425c93ebb66e98aef531b7 Improve opening add movie modal for Discover Overview
  • b801aa093595a33a55e9edd5cda141c4c55a9bb5 New: Add metadata links to telegram messages [ #10242, #10489 ]
  • b2b5aa1f795632311303256aa5d1271bbe07af1f New: Optionally as Instance Name to Telegram notifications [ #10757 ]
  • 8c6ba9a543a308fcf75d43ab7f4ddd43452d2cd4 Fixed: Augmenting languages from indexer for release with stale indexer ID [ #10768 ]
  • 4e024c51d3832e28e981f1e71a5904953bff32ec Fixed: Movies without tags bypassing tags on Download Client [ #10765 ]
  • e4106f0ede441aa637c50de3bf5279bbddf2ee9d Upgrade TypeScript and core-js [ #10763 ]
  • 9032ac20ff599bda8aa9acd02e6d59741233b4da Bump version to 5.16.3
See More * 23fce4bf2e50cef56b336761b01784e4484b09b6 Fixed: Refresh backup list on deletion * 64fd8552f8415a4baebf9ae1998eadc59ac396a3 Fixed: Error getting processes in some cases * e016410c1014892d726b600042bd13ea49c027d6 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * bea943adf8ee3544b8d82dce56dd596f3f37d48d New: Tooltip with extra genres on search and collections * 9780d20f8aedbe45c225c44ee9262327fbad5e3e Improve is visible property check for discover movies * 62722d45b0b7b9c358407481155da44ede0df6c1 Fixed: Using all movie genres for collection filters * 27dd8e8cd5af6c13800d5e9c6acb43298df1ca2f New: Tooltip with extra genres on movie details page * 6c47ede76b7203188f8dc34bcecb9a18102c2aba Fixed: Refreshing movie genres * 7b9562bb38b7f642d4a5252e2a8bba1a2543c624 Update React [ #10703 ] * 8b0b7c1cb0bc496a416236dd935a67e78f7d65e7 New: Reactive search button on Wanted pages [ #10750 ] * 7ebd341cd6dfd8dc29be5b1e05e524ab7c55e61a Sync TimeSpanConverter with upstream [ #10756 ] * 6c85f166ffc8eb037eef58bdd1582358692d281b Bump version to 5.16.2 * 45aabce107c2f70d8040940253636fc1dbf99307 Automated API Docs update * 0caa793df4f3c500ea2ed819bae65a98cea03803 New: Add config file setting for CGNAT authentication bypass * 9a107cc8d7bdff79fb6903dffb8aa2ab2bbad3e5 New: Add Languages to Webhook Notifications [ #10733 ] * a6d727fe2a734163fcd23fb7e1180d285115d327 New: Kometa metadata file creation disabled [ #10738 ] * 01a53d362425d3b41977b20c960160112b8e37ea Automated API Docs update * 348c29c9d782e10fe1f7c785f157529c87e5c1a3 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 64739712c6a2c35e631b1e9cd216e66786ea9373 Add return type for movie lookup and import endpoints [ #10737 ] * 6ac9cca9532b3257a6084ffbb455dca8dae5453a Avoid default category on existing Transmission configurations * a2b38c5b7d8de16b4c844c4406b39de9d20f19ea New: Labels support for Transmission 4.0 * 3cc4105d7191088a536507ed9148c3df924ca093 Bump NLog, Npgsql, Ical.Net, IPAddressRange, ImageSharp and Polly * 3449a5d3fe7696bafdf3a8e0fc795e529d83b7a1 Fixed: Don't fail import if symlink target can't be resolved * 5bac157d365ccefbb0fa883e15f5a0baa57420e4 Remove unnecessary heap allocations in local IP check * 114d260f42612117dad4f8219d1dac6b56136e14 Deprecate Sizeleft and Timeleft queue item properties * 617b9c5d35e73561f3ca8f28cff0541528531e91 Console warnings for missing translations on development builds [ #10669 ] * ba4ccbb0bd6ad6c281339168c75296985c5481e5 Deluge communication improvements * b845268b3d67bcc1f8075ff508dff5f57fc41bc4 New: Support for new SABnzbd history retention values [ #10699 ] * 0fee5520742aa2dbbbe8d1727407847ed2be0671 Bump version to 5.16.1 * 828b994ef4fa457055983e9db67b42e584712206 Support Postgres with non-standard version string * 7952fd325b71ff94f289e68309971607f03cb632 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 4b4e598b67fd1a3a2fa358d2d1bf27104a1f554d New: Add Afrikaans language * 71ccebd0f5dd4454296bbc6919741be65032452b Fix cutoff fixture * 2607c679123f4105f592d4a2232b6007d9b3f507 Fixed: Prevent lack of internet from stopping all health checks from running [ #10694 ] * a626b4f3c426770c1cf361a92d7b576b04e081d9 Fixed: Custom Format upgrading not respecting 'Upgrades Allowed' [ #10691 ] * 1526bf29f485859daf5fcde1872677f2cecc77da Fixed path in downloading to root folder check message * 219477273675b23a426554896a145d553fc9a319 New: Add Albanian language (#10663) * cd490d63349449cfe7aab164a9539d8e10dc4d8f New: Add headers setting in webhook connection * ff609848d811e3b47d40a103a10ca06826d3642a New: Replace 'Ben the Man' release group parsing with 'Ben the Men' [ #10676 ] * 15b6f7212d70174ec3747468f9d28d42379d62dd Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * af06a9f70d3c4e6724eff64104b71fa12d56f141 Webpack web target * c3fa440cf8fcfa23f97fddf1ebbd5aab6d6f37fa Multiple Translations updated by Weblate (#10688) * 0411d6652066d268afc50ccd02f0e2c40de1c1fb Bump version to 5.16.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=144&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.17.2.9580
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 4051cf3d8016f2e386ae786c06466530aa636f0d Fixed: Increase rate limit for PassThePopcorn
  • 9876ed64e24bde902d65f477a6fa86592ff057f4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2f26974ecc9ea5d01b60666a4d1b57963f240cf1 New: Add Tagalog language
  • 25f66a3029b6b7e590829d4b3f0385ee40b62c28 New: Add Marathi language
  • 0e25b2708c2d73d8830df5cebba94fca3e5e8144 Fixed: Sending Manual Interaction Required notifications to Discord for unknown movies
  • 410870d21ec3442502f794966e2e68ec02e6f575 Check if backup folder is writable on backup [ #10806 ]
  • a64d931904cd6c465d5e612d8837c9933c7c3e25 Suggest adding IP to RPC whitelist for on failed Transmission auth
  • f0a9e76cfc753378d041e2882a2c9ae92f89f0d5 Bump version to 5.17.2
  • 6f23c465ee4b290320658f24e1396be30d68e9f0 Don't send session information to Sentry
  • af60cca9ae47c9d4d47f327fa2e2d32cbde50691 Fixed: Advanced settings for Metadata consumers
  • d34d23a052ee11c525edbda4a582e711e5221446 Fixed: Movies updated during Import List Sync not reflected in the UI [ #10794 ]
  • 0a0da42543fa77e872eea7ed432f7f7e51ad7d16 Bump version to 5.17.1
  • e5419f6f06fbc59f2064669122a6465fe3a0cf50 Bump System.Memory [ #10791 ]
  • 88d9c08f1a6d89de9ef3ab94fcef5c6592c2ffd7 Bump MailKit to 4.8.0 and Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 2.1.7 [ #10790 ]
  • 6b4259757c519c4c18a4efa574f8443e78006d08 Add test for do not prefer repacks/propers
  • f1d7c56d94d550ecf810f1826524f7def78b1d65 Fixed: Custom Format score bypassing upgrades not being allowed
  • c81b2e80ee22bbe0acc3d48b04d151612f5b187b Convert MediaInfo to TypeScript [ #10753 ]
  • 5efefd804bcb8f9350d324e5e5f456fa90855c17 Upgrade @typescript-eslint packages to 8.181.1
  • 38f9543526d1cc57ffc3d05382535c0ed363a19b Upgrade Font Awesome to 6.7.1
  • aae68e681ea83c78baf078979b700b7ee9bd9e79 Upgrade babel to 7.26.0
  • 1d21bbf78f69ed8996334d6db43d673681fd353e Bump version to 5.17.0

This list of changes was auto generated.

entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.18.4.9674
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • b0bfbe767c515c37565094663f84aa2155a7461d Add MediaInfo AudioLanguagesAll and update styling
  • 528b93dabe5df8811a11a6d0dc28bdaa2721393d Fixed: Format bitrate for primary streams in media info
  • 1edcbee5e134da296e34f27441010288b07ad6c9 Bump version to 5.18.4
  • 8853dced9fecc1d8c92163ae532352a44268d3d5 Fixed: Health warning for downloading inside root folders
  • c7aa1bae5e06cd834e096141c70a86f8bebca0ca Fixed: Ignore special folders inside Blackhole watch folders
  • 405ae77070754b55dd842c9d053da2a134cfb426 New: Prefer newer Usenet releases
  • 6236bc9b4f4d8fb208d920314d46630a50fd5147 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 743c977e5b242bb68e658c2ba9dba609cd00e86b New: Refresh cache for tracked queue on movies update
  • c0e5646f07014c9544d0288f7dcb6f1f15b69697 Bump Polly and NLog.Layouts.ClefJsonLayout
  • 10094b4e6613331af4bcb2b129338b27b741426f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • d923406f0850214d1ee11f8db05e220ce849a74b Bump version to 5.18.3
See More * 69a9c7228666ff8f394b27309ec438f0ed3b98f5 Fixed: Loading movies with duplicated translations * 55b9477a017b9a5eb72112eeb04653ef065535b7 Fixed: Cleanup duplicated movie translations * 6b81f92137a3a5c70aea293df023eae85a443f80 Fixed: Import Movies page crashing on `console.error` with non-string values * 3ceda1bcdafd81971ee33f034d955cd4b92de97c New: Parse releases with JPN as Japanese and KOR as Korean * f1f19215177c59d3d3b153165039eba91ade35fc Update Trakt ratings logo (#10822) * af0c96538a1a7837b61dfed6a72cc775185557e5 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 3d52f45b6a0636d2595884211687884b2713d5e9 New: reflink support for ZFS * d4715f119da637a90c5eb98f7d97d5b0b84894fa Bump version to 5.18.2 * d58135bf1754b6185eef19a2f4069b27a918d01e Fixed: Augmenting languages for releases with MULTI and other languages (#10842) * b452c10da34603e6e640b19df675ab932849be04 Bump SonarCloud azure extension for UI analysis to 3.X * f6b364725d8357ecf673fa77a39b32967c243149 Additional logging for delay profile decisions [ #10831 ] * 99f6be3f3dd71004d4956c5db6652adc44256eeb New: Show release source in history grab details [ #10830 ] * c2ac49a8735940bb42a7a85b3bff7764f8c954fa Additional logging for custom format score [ #10828 ] * 0e24a3e8bc1a8dbd3b3916b258cc67153a752c53 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 18032cc83bfbcc67cd0f3c14ba493f4946707286 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 927eb389455db4d2a878d1b8452eac039be0f6a0 Bump version to 5.18.1 * 5fac3486130df3b316dd882d676ca13ecb697b59 Bump SonarCloud azure extension to 3.X * 7ba9603449252f24fa99c47aef4706e1b52b3c1d Fixed: Sending Discord notifications with images without absolute links * e36de8ab8d9630ab542268ee5b870af2945a70b0 New: Auto tag based on movie status * f8704a16557669aa56f1eb8578ee2a935b59721d Translate backend: Autotagging + CF specs [ #9647 ] * f507d5154ec162df11c17d65c3f1d73b6cbe0c2e Fixed: Listening on all IPv4 Addresses * 5f03e7142a24a73b14ad9b7aa059f14d87e5ffa8 Fixed: qBittorrent Ratio Limit Check * c0ebbee7c93322c26a4498b3affcd79474afa087 Bump version to 5.18.0 This list of changes was [auto entry.title: New release for Radarr: 5.19.3.9730
entry.content:
To receive further Pre-Release or final updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Radarr within an existing docker container.

Changes:

  • 36c66deb4b345880e64949132227d8483fc71e7c Recommend against using uTorrent
  • edec432244933a2143c5d13c71de7eb210434e7b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 554e15d438512e50e7fc22bd68d45d7b4610fb7f New: Watch list sorting and rate limit for Trakt Import Lists
  • 553645a07c4f70b45b0b0f5533f1feab2b719d42 Bump version to 5.19.2
  • 7de7e83c5bd136bf5fdbf78746e734f07969ab81 New: Add Blu-ray link to movie details
  • b7a46bedb036f6e57a2f2d043ddcbd1659fea82d Fixed: Avoid checking for free space if other specifications fail first
  • 0925769377e79dca436de2763d2f902b6e90f0c4 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 72244362feedf632d2173339177908aaa2cb65d8 Automated API Docs update
  • c6526c34e97e40bf3a5ccaa62f0db6649c6b89e0 Cleanse console log messages
  • efa2913dbc72fc1baadd534c1eabdf479958d117 Translate Trakt popular list types
See More * 35c22a4ffa15f62f18661a70cd2ea172669ba3b4 Fixed: Only show Additional Parameters on Trakt Popular list * 66d96e21dab2ec6824e8fe2654ceadb9a64bec10 Fixed: Fallback to Instance Name for Discord notifications * 36d4e9e6cdcf2de58270dd1d8db174ed492af609 New: Movie Requested filter for interactive search * 7189d7b15c0dec923310cbf5329ac705af5e5b1f Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6e80113987bb981902d22ed187c9bece66d7b60a Automated API Docs update * bb8a0dda631cd1b084b7cb165457a6224608935e Fixed: Processing existing movie files via Manage Files * 525ed6568797ce8eb9821957c67b1d90eb8a6a7e Fix download links for FileList when passkey contains spaces * 3fbccc6af3369db96efc95b9399ed22885c7ddde Bump version to 5.19.2 * 8e10eecface61ce227864b2bb507748a73274300 Fixed: Close Metadata settings modal on saving * a3b1512552a8a5bc0c0d399d961ccbf0dba97749 Fixed: Parsing some titles with FRE as French and ITA as Italian * d375b5ffbe03f6939372f59b4e69ae9dcf5c5940 Fixed: Parse GER/DE releases as German language * 884abc03688044d021e5a5a6cefc78bf16695b82 Bump version to 5.19.1 * f8da7aae033d8f94229c38d9d354ddcee60c7cea Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * c165118d4d38b1543a75a8f8e72e87340a289d24 Update README.md * b3dd571a926576678c397a7e87937b714ae2c257 New: Migrated StevenLu URL to new URL * dd900eb7395144b6d299f10fe9475d49d194664e Building docs on ARM * 66aae0c91cd5ac6614c6b54c8e4f9137404025b8 Fixed: Reject multi-part files with P1, P2, etc. * d888a0a2b3bac62f6511f54824d69658de69bfd8 Automated API Docs update * cb5416a18ca8145ccac10c1be20ffb7875e513b7 Improve message for unknown movie rejection in release searching * 7977e0be05a3ea85e7b55d0647a7aad96d3daa74 Add reason enum to decision engine rejections * cd836fef38d58765044c91958096489819bb3c4c Bump version to 5.19.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Radarr/961c82cf-1428-4ab0-9257-63be1671eac8/_release?releaseId=157&_a=release-summary).
